name: Jam'N'Space
description:
This is Asteroids With PowerUps
W- Forward Momentum
A/D-Rotate
S- Slow to a stop
Space-Shoot

Shift + E = invulnerability
Shift + W = speed
Shift + A or D = increased maneuverability

Aliens have a chance to drop a powerup that gives you energy!

For increased difficulty you may press either "O" to spawn alien ship, or "P" to spawn asteroid.
